cost_per_yalm.label: Cost per Yalm
cost_per_yalm.tooltip: Set the cost per Yalm for movement and teleporting decisions.

time_to_teleport.label: Time to Teleport
time_to_teleport.tooltip: Set the time (seconds) it takes to teleport.

should_teleport.label: Should Teleport
should_teleport.tooltip: Enable or disable teleportation for traversal.

mount_id.label: Mount
mount_id.tooltip: Set the mount to use for traversal.

use_mount_roulette.label: Use Mount Roulette
use_mount_roulette.tooltip: Enable or disable mount roulette for traversal.
